# SwiftLink

> A powerful, free tool to shrink long links into memorable short URLs. Track clicks, analyze traffic, and boost your brand visibility.

## Core Pages

- [Home](https://your-domain.com)
- [Blogs](https://your-domain.com/blog)
- [Privacy Policy](https://your-domain.com/privacy)

## Features

- **Shortening**: Instant URL shortening with analytics tracking.

## API Usage

Our platform provides endpoints for:
- Creating short links
